name: Advanced Bioprocess Development Limited
membership: WssTP (Water Supply and Sanitation Technology Platform) http://wsstp.eu/
goal:
Advanced Bioprocess Development Limited (ABD) develops processes for water and wastewater treatment, although its expanded bed biofilm reactor (EBBR) technology can also be used for fermentation or biocatalysis.

ABD is dedicated to improving the ecological status of waters, through providing access to its innovative EBBR technology. For example, its tertiary treatment process can remove ammonia, nitrite, organic matter (BOD), suspended solids, coliform bacteria, and oestrogens (E1, E2 & EE2).
interests: Climate Action, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Research and Technology
